short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamlines your workflow for testing pages in Google Tag Manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The GTM Super-Saver extension helps make your marketing tagging easier by automatically refreshing your preview tabs whenever you save changes to a tag or trigger in your GTM control panel. Activate the plugin to automatically refresh your preview tabs and deactivate when you want to stick to the traditional GTM workflow.
